menu.title: The 'Fitness' menu'
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. The product of active and healthy people. This is a brand new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: The 'Lean' menu'
menu.descr: The Lean menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: The 'Premium' menu'
menu.descr: In the Premium menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
